metadata.description: Correspondence between Acting Post Office Inspector Benedicto Cunanan, Budget and Finance Commissioner Ismael Mathay, Secretary of National Defense and Communications Major General Basilio Valdes, and President Sergio Osmeña regarding the proposed budget and plantilla of the post-office personnel in the Province of Leyte
metadata.subject: Basilio Valdes; World War II; Leyte; official papers; letters; Secretary of National Defense and Communications
metadata.title: Correspondence between Acting Post Office Inspector Benedicto Cunanan, Budget and Finance Commissioner Ismael Mathay, Secretary of National Defense and Communications Major General Basilio Valdes, and President Sergio Osmeña regarding the proposed budget and plantilla of the post-office personnel in the Province of Leyte
